bibl.title: Four Oxyrhynchos Papyri.
bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society. - 1. Plato, Republic Book I, 330 a2-b4. 3rd cent. A.D. - 2. Notice of Death of Slaves. A.D. 79/80. - 3. Private Account. First half of 4th cent. A.D. - 4. Sale of Wine in Advance. 26 February A.D. 492 (à corriger en 27 February) [= P. Oxy. XLIX, 3509-3512].
bibl.seg: Egypt Exploration Society. - 1. Plato, Republic Book I, 330 a2-b4. 3rd cent. A.D. - 2. Notice of Death of Slaves. A.D. 79/80. - 3. Private Account. First half of 4th cent. A.D. - 4. Sale of Wine in Advance. 26 February A.D. 492 (à corriger en 27 February) [= P. Oxy. XLIX, 3509-3512].
